name: Transcriptly
description: Transcriptly is an online service that allows users to transcribe audio and video files to text instantly, supporting 98+ languages and various formats like MP3, MP4, WAV, M4A, and MOV.
longDescription: Transcriptly is an AI-powered online transcription tool that converts audio and video files, including YouTube videos and locally uploaded files, into text. For YouTube videos, users paste the video URL, select a language, and the service extracts and processes subtitles using YouTube's public API, supporting both auto-generated and manual subtitles. For local files, users upload audio or video files in supported formats, and the AI-powered engine processes them to generate text with timestamps, ensuring high accuracy. The platform also offers interactive transcript analysis and API support for developers to batch process transcripts. It serves a wide range of users such as students, content creators, journalists, and businesses by providing fast, accurate, and accessible transcription solutions.
features: AI-Powered Transcript Accuracy achieves 99% accuracy with proper punctuation, timestamps, and speaker detection for both YouTube and local files, enhancing reliability for users.
Fast Audio & Video Processing converts files to text in seconds, with most files processed within one minute, saving time for busy professionals and creators.
Multi-Language Support handles 98+ languages for transcription, making it ideal for international content and multilingual users.
API Support provides dedicated APIs for developers to batch process YouTube video transcripts, enabling efficient high-volume extraction for advanced applications.
Multiple Download Formats allow exporting transcripts in SRT, VTT, TXT, CSV, PDF, DOCX, and more, ensuring compatibility with various editing and analysis tools.
Interactive Transcript Analysis enables users to chat with transcripts using AI to summarize content, extract key points, and generate insights, adding value beyond basic transcription.
YouTube Integration allows seamless extraction of subtitles from YouTube videos without length limits, simplifying access to video content in text form.
Local File Upload supports various formats like MP3, MP4, WAV, M4A, MOV, and more, offering flexibility for transcribing personal audio and video recordings.
Timestamping and Punctuation automatically adds timestamps and proper punctuation to transcripts, improving readability and usability for editing or reference.

faqs.question: How does the YouTube transcription service work?
faqs.answer: It uses YouTube's public API to extract and process video subtitles; users paste the URL, select a language, and get transcriptions within seconds, supporting auto-generated and manual subtitles.

faqs.question: What languages are supported for YouTube transcripts?
faqs.answer: It supports all languages available through YouTube's caption system, including major languages like English, Spanish, and Chinese, depending on the video's captions.

faqs.question: Is there a limit on video length for YouTube text extraction?
faqs.answer: No, there is no limit on video length, though processing time may increase for very long videos.

faqs.question: How does local file transcription work?
faqs.answer: Users upload audio or video files (MP3, MP4, WAV, M4A, MOV, etc.), and the AI engine processes them securely, generating text with timestamps.

faqs.question: What file formats are supported for local transcription?
faqs.answer: It supports MP3, MP4, WAV, M4A, MOV, AAC, FLAC, AVI, and more, with recommendations for high-quality audio for best accuracy.

faqs.question: What languages are supported for transcription?
faqs.answer: It supports 98+ languages for both YouTube and local files, including English, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese, French, and German.

faqs.question: Is there a limit on local file length or size?
faqs.answer: It supports files up to 90 minutes for local files, with recommendations for files under 1 hour or 200MB; longer files should be split.

faqs.question: Is this service free to use?
faqs.answer: It offers a free plan for 10 YouTube videos or 100 minutes of local files per month; premium plans are available for more features and capacity.

faqs.question: How accurate are the transcriptions?
faqs.answer: It achieves 99% accuracy for clear audio; accuracy varies based on audio quality, speaker clarity, and background noise for local files.

faqs.question: Can I download the transcriptions?
faqs.answer: Yes, in formats like SRT, VTT, TXT, CSV, PDF, DOCX, with additional options for premium users.

faqs.question: How soon can I expect my transcription results?
faqs.answer: Most files are transcribed within one minute; 1-hour files typically under 1-2 minutes, depending on server load and quality.
